group_1.textLeft: ...Alright, this is as good a stopping point@as any, so let's take our lunch break.

group_1.textRight: I'm sorry! I'm a bit of a slow eater...

group_1.textLeft: Ahh, you're fine, you're fine!
I'm the one who should apologize,@for Tsuruno tagging along on your trip....

group_1.textRight: N-no! Please don't worry about it!

group_1.textLeft: Haha...sorry about this.
Well, I'm going back to the house@for a bit - take care.
...And I'm just so...[chara:100301:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100301:cheek_1][chara:100301:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json:motion_101][chara:100301:lipSynch_1]looking forward to it!@Going on a trip!

The summer season! An inn by the sea!@[chara:100301:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100301:cheek_1][chara:100301:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:100301:lipSynch_1][chara:100301:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Hehe...this is the best!
...That's right! You know what,@I also bought a new swimsuit!
Well...[chara:100301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100301:cheek_0][chara:100301:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json:motion_101][chara:100301:lipSynch_1]alright! I've got it right here,@so I'll change into it!
[chara:100351:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Like this!

group_1.textRight: You really changed just like that...

group_1.textLeft: Whaddya think?
I'll be swimming all over the ocean@with this swimsuit!
Alright! Then we're going to have@a contest at sea!

I can swim like [chara:100351:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100351:motion_400][chara:100351:lipSynch_1]this, [chara:100351:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100351:motion_200][chara:100351:lipSynch_1]and this,@[chara:100351:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100351:motion_201][chara:100351:lipSynch_1]and even like this!

After that I'll do [chara:100351:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100351:motion_100][chara:100351:lipSynch_1]this, [chara:100351:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100351:motion_101][chara:100351:lipSynch_1]this, [chara:100351:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100351:motion_300][chara:100351:lipSynch_1]and this,@[chara:100351:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100351:motion_400][chara:100351:lipSynch_1]then this that these and this!

group_1.textRight: H-hold on, Tsuruno, you're going@a little overboard...

group_1.textLeft: Then I finish by exploding onto@the beach...
TSURUNO EXERCISE! LET'S GO!

Yepyepyep[chara:100351:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100351:motion_101][chara:100351:lipSynch_1]yepyepyepyep!@[chara:100351:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100351:motion_200][chara:100351:lipSynch_1]Yepyepyepyep[chara:100351:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100351:motion_201][chara:100351:lipSynch_1]yepyepyep!
[chara:100101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Eh?!
...Huh?
...I-it is, but...
You see... R-right now, we're on break...
...Don't tell me?!
There wasn't a sign out front saying@we're on break...
Daaad...!
U-um!
How do I say...this is...
[flashEffect:flashWhite2](...Ha! That's it...!)
...Our restaurant's summer uniform!
I-I was just trying it on...!
Th-this was just a trial run!

group_1.textRight: (This is bad...you're just giving one excuse@after another as your story...!)

group_1.textLeft: ...Phew...
[chara:100351:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Fooled him!
...Huh...? No, wait...
Did he not hear me...@When I said it was a "trial run?"
...It's only a test, so I won't be@wearing it tomorrow...
...I should go remind him of that...
I'll go after him and let him know!

group_1.textRight: Wait! You can't go outside dressed@like thaaat!

group_1.narration: Before leaving for her trip the next day,@Tsuruno put a poster up on the front of the store,@but what it said was...
"The introduction of our restaurant's@summer uniforms has been postponed."
